mapper.insert:
select nvl(max(orderNo), 0)+1 from Orderr
insert into Orderr(orderNo, username, shipName, shipAddr, orderPrice, orderDat) values(#{orderNo}, #{username}, #{shipName}, #{shipAddr}, #{orderPrice},sysdate)
mapper.update: update Orderr set orderPrice = #{orderPrice} where orderNo = #{orderNo} and username = #{username}
mapper.select: select po.orderDate, p.name, p.mainImg, p.price, poi.cartNum, poi.odtStatus, poi.odtNo, poi.orderNo, poi.code from orderDetail poi left outer join orderr po on poi.orderno=po.orderno left outer join acc p on poi.code=p.code where username=#{username}
